name: Svlata Diertrovich
comment: Is this a secret, hidden post? I'm not even sure how I got to this page. A glimpse into the mind of the author?

replies.name: Christopher Robison
replies.comment: Thanks for pointing that out. The main blog index was not updated but the site navigation was. I fixed it so this blog post appears in the index as it should. Thanks again for the heads-up!
